mapper.sql: PERMISSION_ID, PERMISSION_NAME, PERMISSION_DESC, PERMISSION_CODE, REGION_NBR, NOTES, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, STATUS_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT p.*,t1.locId FROM SYS_PERMISSION p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.LOC_NAME AS commonRegionName,c.LOC_ID as locId, c.LOC_CODE FROM TB_POLITICAL_LOCATION c WHERE c.STATUS_CD = '1000') t1 ON t1.LOC_CODE = p.REGION_NBR WHERE p.PERMISSION_ID = #{id}

SELECT count(*) FROM SYS_PERMISSION p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cr.REGION_NAME as regionName, cr.REGION_NBR FROM TB_COMMON_REGION cr WHERE cr.STATUS_CD = '1000' ) t1 ON t1.REGION_NBR = p.REGION_NBR
AND (p.PERMISSION_NAME like #{keyWord} OR p.PERMISSION_CODE like #{keyWord})
